snippet: Many facts in Mr. Trump’s acceptance speech appear to be true, though he sometimes failed to offer the entire story or provide all of the context....

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and NICK CORASANITI

lead_paragraph: Many facts in Mr. Trump’s acceptance speech appear to be true, though he sometimes failed to offer the entire story or provide all of the context.

headline.main: Fact-Checking the Truth That Donald Trump Promised
